name: One Last Dance For The Capitalist Pigs
name_original: One Last Dance For The Capitalist Pigs
description:
Have you ever watched TV that was so trash you wanted to lead a revolution ? Or like, just be a mess ? This game is for you.

Go on a lukewarm quest against the system, solve puzzles, meet weirdos.

Gamepad and input remapping are supported with the in-game menu. It should take less than an hour to complete but you can save your progress at any time. The game is fully localized in both English and French.

I released this game in 2013, after working on it for 3 years on and off. I wanted to experiment with grid based geometry editing tools in the vein of what Tomb Raider 1 to 5 did, so I built myself a basic 3D modeler in Unity. I hand drew the textures and scanned them.
